description: Welcome to the International Learning Designs Challenge! Our aim is to engage the teaching community from across the globe to join in designing, sharing, and discussing how to create great learning designs for transforming education. The challenge will run from 10th to 14th February 2014. During the event we will all work together to innovate and share our ideas, using the Learning Designer to create one 100 designs that use technology effectively. We will be holding a week of activities and we invite you to take part using this site as the hub.
title: International Learning Designs Challenge
institution_name: Institute of Education, University of London
